## Introduction to Dataset

-   "Real Breast Cancer Data"
-   Source: www.kaggle.com
-   Raw: 341 observations - 16 variables
-   Clean: 307 observations - 14 variables

### Removed
-   Variables with no outcome (Patient status)
-   Columns with only 1 unique variable (ER.Status and PR.Status)
